content.p: Research Operations provides an end-to-end service from pre to post award including contracts, project delivery, governance and closure, ensuring regulatory, financial and statutory compliance for the university. This includes: If you are an external visitor with a query please contact us at research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk. Staff and students can find training and support on our Research and Innovation SharePoint site (login required). The university is committed to maintaining the highest standards of integrity, rigour and excellence in all aspects of our research. Visitors can find out more on our Research Ethics and Integrity page. Staff and students should visit our dedicated Research Ethics and Integrity SharePoint site (login required). Research governance exists to safeguard participants of health and social care research by setting standards for research conduct, defining how these standards should be delivered and assessing these arrangements once in place. We have an introductory guide on our SharePoint site (login required) and our Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) are maintained on our Workspace (staff login required). Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
